entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
